show_name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? III (TV)
other_title: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darō ka III (Japanese)
ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか III (Japanese)
plot: Hestia Familia faces an unparalleled crisis when Bell encounters an injured vouivre (dragon-type monster girl) in the Dungeon. . . one who can talk. His decision to protect the girl, who will come to be called Weine, upends everything he and his familia thought they understood about monsters and threatens to put them at odds with Orario as a whole. But Weine is just part of greater schemes concerning talking monsters, schemes which Hestia Familia will soon find themselves at the heart of.
